name: Uprising
tagline: independent digital creative studio based in Italy
description:
Uprising™ is an independent digital creative studio based in Italy. Passionate group obsessed about excellence and innovative technologies
Born in 2011, Uprising™ is determined to provide an unconventional and innovative product with the ambition of inspiring the digital environment.
Their core expertise is the translation of a strategic creative idea into an interactive user experience able to exceed user's expectations.
